summary:
This mod adds some
Craft recipes ofr most useless items in game
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds some
Craft recipes ofr most useless items in game: linen wrap, some skulls, ink, quill, paper roll, etc.

1 troll skull + 1 human skull + 1 mammon tusk = 20 bone meal
3 paper roll + 1 inkwell + 1 quill = 10 scolls of soultrap
2 paper roll + 1 inkwell + 1 quill = 5 scrolls of reanimate
2 paper roll + 1 inkwell + 1 quill = 5 scrolls of invisibility
1 linen wrap + 1 charcoal + 1 firewood = 1 torch
5 linen wrap + 5 charcoal + 5 firewood = 5 torches
1 linen wrap + 1 charcoal + 1 firewood + 1 papaer roll + 1 dwemer oil = 20 torches
author: ELAF
